channel.description: Recent content in ChicoState on Chico State DSI Blog

item.title: Data Science info session
item.description: Missed this event? Watch the Video Recording here: [https://media.csuchico.edu/media/0_kkfl6yt8] When: Friday, Nov 2nd, noon Where: Butte 101 Do you want to increase your ability to read, understand, create and communicate data as information? To tell a better data story? Do you want to be a better consumer and curator of news, improving your ability to identify bull-oney stories that are only aimed to spread false information? Are you concerned about ethics and fairness in algorithms that are used for decisions such as whether or not you get that home mortgage, or that your resume is not tossed out without being seen due to a bias in the screening algorithm.

item.title: Current job and research project openings at Chico State
item.description: Strategic Planning Student Assistant Department: Office of the President, CSU, Chico Project Details: As one of the first steps in the strategic planning process, we are conducting both internal and external scans. The internal scan will review internal data (Presidentâ€™s Listening Tour, Campus Climate Survey, Alumni Attitude Survey, Spring Graduate Survey, etc.) to identify institutional strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats. The external (environmental) scan will examine patterns of change in the surrounding environment that will impact Chico State as an institution in the future.
